N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 702.3 - Communication between defendant and courtroom

State Regulations

If the defendant shall have been
removed from the courtroom under the provisions of the preceding section, the
trial judge shall make reasonable efforts to establish methods of communication
linking the defendant with the courtroom while his trial is in progress. For
such a defendant the trial judge may provide such methods of communication as
may be suitable to the physical facilities of the courthouse and consonant with
the goal of providing adequate communication to the courtroom and to defense
counsel. Notes
